subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: PROTECTION RITUAL FILE POSTED
author: Robin Searcy Henson
full_text:

------=_NextPart_001_00D5_01C85707.9CF2E210
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

As someone who has never used a protection ritual (even though I consider m=
yself a very spiritual person), I'm not sure I understand what the ritual i=
s intended to protect the person invoking it from.  I'm not being a smart a=
ss; I'm simply trying to learn.  Can we be hurt physically or psychically b=
y certain spirits, or can our experimentation open a dark portal that's not=
 meant to be opened?  My instinct has always been that if I don't acknowled=
ge evil it can have no power over me, but perhaps that's ignorant.  I once =
invited spirits into my house from outside and immediately recorded a negat=
ive EVP while heating a cup of coffee in the microwave.  I was too ecstatic=
 to be frightened by the message, but since then I've wondered what kind of=
 spirit would want to say such a thing to me and if I should be more cautio=
us in the future.  I would love some feedback on this recording.

Robin 


=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Sumption<mailto:franks-boxes=
@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com=
> 
  Sent: Sunday, January 13, 2008 8:09 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: PROTEC=
TION RITUAL FILE POSTED


  Bad idea! In my opinion. You just create fear w=
ith that crap, and 
  fear feeds itself. Once again, you will create what y=
ou expect to 
  get. If you use protection BS, you'll have convinced yourse=
lf that 
  there is something to be affraid of, and so you will tend to cre=
at a 
  thoughtform to fulfill that expectation.

  Frank-S

  --- In EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, "bhali333" 
  <parano=
rmalinvestigating@...> wrote:
  >
  > everyone,
  > 
  > I have written up =
the short protection ritual I use before every 
  > session, I have been us=
ing it for quite a while now and have had no 
  > problems with dark heads =
other than the occasional curse word.
  > 
  > I recommend that all researc=
hers experienced and new use this or a 
  > similar protection ritual befor=
e every box session if you are not 
  > already. 
  > 
  > hey it's better =
to have it and not need it , than need it and not 
  have 
  > it!
  > 
  >=
 I will post it in the files section in a folder marked 
  > "protection ri=
tual"
  > 
  > Thanks guy's
  > 
  > Bruce
  >



   
------=_NextPart_001_00D5_01C85707.9CF2E210
